nodes.text: Ktil was an Inner Rim astronomical object located in the grid square N-9 of the Standard Galactic Grid.

Ktil was introduced in the current Star Wars canon in the fifty-second issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around December 30, 2015. The planet Ktil was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
